thread.title: New York Plot: Turning Broadway Flops Into Big Hits on a Bare Budget

author: Charles Passy
title: New York Plot: Turning Broadway Flops Into Big Hits on a Bare Budget
text:
Broadway has given the world many a hit musical. “House of Flowers,” “Cabin in the Sky” and the aptly titled “Pipe Dream” are not among them.
But these and dozens of other largely forgotten shows have found a second life at New York City Center through its “Encores!” series, which launches its 25th season next week.
First up: “Hey, Look Me...
